text: The Westerwaldkreis ("District of Westerwald") is a district (Kreis) in the north-east of Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. == Towns and municipalities == Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden *1.
